mapper.insert: INSERT into orderProduct (userId, stayNo, manCnt, petCnt, rcvPhone) VALUES (#{userId}, #{stayNo}, #{manCnt}, #{petCnt}, #{rcvPhone})
INSERT into cart (userId, stayNo, period, price, cartQty) VALUES (#{userId}, #{stayNo}, #{period}, #{price}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT c.cartId, s.stayNo, s.stayName, c.price, c.period FROM cart c left join stay s on c.stayNo = s.stayNo where c.userId = #{userId}
